name: Ascend (itch) (ComboSmooth, TimmyShire, KrowMagg, SunshineQueen, Pawa)
description:
Made for the Buddy Up Jam: Winter 2022.

Use your big balloon to explore what lies above your world. The journey WILL be perilous.

If for some reason you do not see a START button, try using a different internet browser or dling the MAC or PC version.
